About the Game

â—†Story
At the beginning of the world, men were no different from animals, and there were so such things as states or families. The unnamed sea of uncertainty was an obstacle to the growth of man's wisdom. Then suddenly, a strange stone fell into the centre of the sea. Therefore, that land was named â€˜Xianluoâ€™.

In the early days of Xianluo, there were war and turmoil everywhere. In the midst of this chaos, there was a person who was invincible with just her own abilities. Legend has it that she wielded a divine weapon that no one in the world could defeat. This woman was able to overpower all the others and unite Xianluo. She named her kingdom â€˜Long Ageâ€™, called herself the â€˜Emperor of Ageâ€™ and set up the calendar â€˜The Agesâ€™ to inform the world. After that, the world had come to peace.

The unnamed weapon was called the â€˜Skyhill Swordâ€™ because it was like the sky dome dominating all the hills.

But now, with the legend of Skyhillâ€™s pair â€˜Heaven Swordâ€™ emerging, the world of gangs was about to be embroiled in a huge fight again.
This was the reason why the disciple of the Kingâ€™s Mountain Gang, Lu Huangding, and the daughter of the gangâ€™s master, Yuan Liai, embarked on their journey...

â—†Gameplay Instructions
The game is an RPG with bitmap animated main storyline and a portrait dialogue system, and a map system to enter scenes for storylines or trigger events.

Explore the scenes for treasures and defeat enemies to gain powerful equipment, and learn new martial arts skills by completing the mastery side stories to become more resourceful in battle.

There are many exciting sex scenes. But you can choose to avoid them by not triggering them to achieve a pure love ending.

â—†Game features
â—‡Lots of basic CG+different score
â—‡RPG storyline plus map exploration, battle system and other rich contents
â—‡Two main female characters, two secondary female characters
H plot mainly for NTR

data.short_description: The Kingâ€™s Mountain Gang disciple, Lu Huanding, set out with her childhood friend Yuan Liai and the others, To find the legendary lost Excalibur. The ventured in the world of gangs, encountered many incidents of that world on the way, experienced all kinds of dangers, and solved various problems.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains nudity, sexual content, general mature content, sexual acts, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, bondage.
All characters are over the age of 20.
